alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 7:12PM MST until July 26 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM MST FOR NORTHEASTERN PIMA COUNTY... At 711 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Valencia West, or 15 miles west of Tucson, moving west at 15 to 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Tucson, Marana, Sahuarita, Casas Adobes, Drexel Heights, Flowing Wells, South Tucson, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Summit, Tucson Estates, Saguaro National Park West, Corona De Tucson, Valencia West, Tucson International Airport, Rita Ranch and Picture Rocks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
